l:dependency.name: HockeyApp Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Uploads iOS, Mac or Android apps to hockeyapp.net

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Git Provider - Common library
l:dependency.l:description: Common library for SCM Git Provider.

l:dependency.name: Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM Git Provider - Git Executable Impl.
l:dependency.l:description: Executable implementation for SCM Git Provider.

l:dependency.name: Maven SCM API
l:dependency.l:description: The SCM API provides mechanisms to manage all SCM tools.

l:dependency.name: Plexus Common Utilities
l:dependency.l:description: A collection of various utility classes to ease working with strings, files, command lines, XML and more.

l:dependency.name: Apache JAMES Mime4j
l:dependency.l:description: Java stream based MIME message parser

l:dependency.name: Commons IO
l:dependency.l:description: The Commons IO library contains utility classes, stream implementations, file filters, file comparators, endian transformation classes, and much more.

l:dependency.name: JSON.simple
l:dependency.l:description: A simple Java toolkit for JSON

l:dependency.name: Commons Codec
l:dependency.l:description: The codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities.

l:dependency.name: Commons Logging
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.
